div.data-layout-label: Bellevue Community School District Header Content

div.p:
"The primary aim of education is not to enable students to do well in school, but to help them do well in their lives outside of school."
- Bill Daggett, International Center for Leadership in Education

h2.strong: Believe in the Blue! Believe in Learning! Believe in Bellevue!

a.strong: Bellevue Community School District “Continuous Learning Plan” - Information and FAQ’s
Coronavirus (COVID-19) Updates for the Bellevue Community School District
School Improvement Advisory Council Learning Data
September 2019 School Improvement Advisory Council Agenda and Notes
Physical Plant and Equipment Levy (PPEL) Continuation Information November 5 Election - Thanks for the support in extending this funding for our students!
Believe in the Blue, Mid-Week Minute or Two Weekly Video
Beyond the Blue Inductees and Biographies 2017

div.p: Do you know of outstanding things Bellevue Community School District graduates have accomplished or contributed to? Check out the "Beyond the Blue" link above to nominate them for the "Beyond the Blue" award for next year.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Little Stars Preschool consists of a 3 year-old program, 4 year-old program, and transitional Kindergarten. The 3 year-olds attend AM or PM on Tuesdays and Thursdays. The 4 year-olds attend AM or PM Monday through Friday.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Bellevue Schools is one of the schools supported by the Mississippi Bend Area Education Agency (AEA 9). They provide the services of an educational consultant, a school psychologist, and a speech language pathologist.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: The school is continually looking to step beyond the textbook, and to allow students to engage in “real-life”, “relevant” and “critical thinking” activities and situations.

div.data-layout-label: Bellevue Community School District Footer Content

div.p:
